sen.j: けいはんなプラザは、京都府相楽郡精華町光台にある関西文化学術研究都市（けいはんな学研都市）の中核施設。
sen.e: KEIHANNA PLAZA is a central facility of Kansai Science City (Keihanna Science City) in Hikaridai, Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
KEIHANNA PLAZA is a central facility at Kansai Science City (Keihanna Science City) in Hikaridai, Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
KEIHANNA PLAZA is a central facility at Kansai Science City (Keihanna Science City) in Hikaridai, Seika-cho, Soraku-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 官民共同出資の株式会社けいはんなが運営し、ラボ棟、スーパーラボ棟、交流棟の3つのビルから構成されている。
sen.e: Publicly- and privately-funded KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. operates this faciilty consisting of Laboratory wing, Super-laboratory wing, and Interaction wing.
Publicly and privately funded KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. operates this faciilty, consisting of the Laboratory wing, the Super-laboratory wing, and the Interaction wing.
Publicly and privately funded Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporated operates this facility, consisting of the Laboratory wing, the Super-laboratory wing, and the Interaction wing.
sen.cmt: 株式会社けいはんな→Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporatedのようです。 （参考：http://www.keihanna-plaza.co.jp/01general/index.html）

sen.j: ラボ棟には研究施設、郵便局などがあり、交流棟には｢けいはんなプラザホテル｣や、レストラン、住友ホールがある。
sen.e: Laboratory wing houses research facilities and a post office; Interaction wing contains restaurants and Sumitomo Hall.
The Laboratory wing houses research facilities and a post office; the Interaction wing contains restaurants and Sumitomo Hall.
The Laboratory wing houses research facilities and a post office; the Interaction wing contains Keihanna Plaza Hotel, restaurants and Sumitomo Hall.
sen.cmt: ホテル を追加しました。

sen.j: 広場にあるモニュメントは日時計で、世界最大。
sen.e: There is a monument at its square: a world's biggest sundial.
There is a monument in a square here: the world's biggest sundial.
There is a monument in a square here: the world's biggest sundial.

sen.j: ギネスブックにも登録されている（設計者：横川隆一）。
sen.e: It is in the Guinness Book (designed by Ryuichi YKOGAWA).
It is in the Guinness Book of Records, and was designed by Ryuichi YOKOGAWA.
sen.cmt: I removed the parentheses as it read like Ryuichi Yokogawa designed the Guinness Book of Records.
sen.e: It is in the Guinness Book of Records, and was designed by Ryuichi YOKOGAWA.

sen.j: 1978年（昭和53年）9月 関西学術研究都市調査懇談会（座長：奥田東（元京都大学総長））発足。
sen.e: In September 1978, Kansai Science City Surveillance Conversazione was set up (Chairman: Higashi Okuda, ex principal of Kyoto University).
In September 1978, Kansai Science City Surveillance Conversazione was set up (Chairman: Higashi OKUDA, ex principal of Kyoto University).
September 1978: Kansai Science City Surveillance Conversazione was set up (Chairman: Azuma OKUDA, former President of Kyoto University).
sen.cmt: 京都大学では総長をPresident としているようですので、こちらもそのようにしました。（参考：http://www.kyoto-u.ac.jp/en/news_data/h/h1/2008/news7/080523_2.htm）奥田東→Azuma OKUDA と修正しました。"In September 1978,"→"September 1978:"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1983年（昭和58年）3月 関西文化学術研究都市建設推進協議会発足。
sen.e: In March 1983, Kansai Science City Construction Promotion Conference was set up.
In March 1983, Kansai Science City Construction Promotion Conference was set up.
March 1983: Kansai Science City Construction Promotion Conference was set up.

sen.j: 1986年（昭和61年）6月 財団法人関西文化学術研究都市推進機構設立(国土庁「関西文化学術研究都市建設基本方針」を策定）。
sen.e: In June 1986, Kansai Research Institute Foundation was established (National Land Agency created "Basic plan of Kansai Science City").
In June 1986, the Kansai Research Institute Foundation was established, and the National Land Agency created the "Basic plan of Kansai Science City".
June 1986: The Kansai Research Institute Foundation was established, and the National Land Agency created the 'Basic policy on the constructions of Kansai Science City.'
sen.cmt: 関西文化学術研究都市建設基本方針→Basic policy on the constructions of Kansai Science City （他ファイルと統一しました）"In June 1986, the"→"June 1986: The "に変更しました。

sen.j: 1987年（昭和62年）6月 関西文化学術研究都市建設促進法公布施行。
sen.e: In June 1987, Construction promotion law for Kansai Science City was promulgated and became effective.
In June 1987, the Construction Promotion Law for Kansai Science City was promulgated and became effective.
sen.cmt: 「the」挿入, capitals added as this looks like the name of the law.
sen.e: June 1987: The Construction Promotion Law for Kansai Science City was promulgated and became effective.
sen.cmt: "In June 1987, the"→"June 1987: The"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1989年（平成元年）1月 関西文化学術研究都市推進機構が「文化学術研究交流施設の具体化に関する調査」結果をまとめる。
sen.e: In January 1989, Kansai Research Institute completed "Survey on Concretization of Reserch Intersection Facilities."
sen.cmt: 「文化学術研究交流施設の具体化に関する調査」→"Survey on Concretization of Reserch Intersection Facilities"[定訳不明]
sen.e: In January 1989, Kansai Research Institute completed the "Survey of the Embodiment of Mixed Academic Research Facilities."
sen.cmt: 「the」挿入, the title of the survey seems unnatural - but I am not sure of the accuracy of my translation.
sen.e: January 1989: Kansai Research Institute completed the "Survey of the Embodiment of a Cultural and Research Interaction Facility."
sen.cmt: 文化学術研究交流施設の具体化に関する調査→Survey of the Embodiment of a Cultural and Research Interaction Facility としました。 (参考：http://www.keihanna-plaza.co.jp/eng/01corp_info/index.html）"In January 1989,"→"January 1989:"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1989年（平成元年）4月 文化学術研究交流施設の準備室が大阪市内に置かれる（施設を設置運営する会社名を京都、大阪、奈良をソフトに表現して「けいはんな」とすることを賢人会議で決定）。
sen.e: In April 1989, Preparation Room of Reserch Intersection Facilities was set up in Osaka City (the Wisemen group decided the name of operating company of the facilities "KEIHANNA" which softly represents Kyoto, Nara, and Osaka).
sen.cmt: 文化学術研究交流施設の準備室→Preparation Room of Research Intersection Facilities[定訳不明]
sen.e: In April 1989, the Preparation Room of the Mixed Academic Research Facilities was set up in Osaka City (the Wisemen group decided to call the operating company of the facilities "KEIHANNA", which has a soft sound and represents Kyoto, Nara, and Osaka).
sen.cmt: 「the」挿入,「Reserch Intersection」→「Mixed Academic Research」, 「the name of」→「to call the」, 「,」挿入,「softly」→「has a soft sound and」
sen.e: April 1989: The Preparation Room of a Cultural and Research Interaction Facility was set up in Osaka City (the Wisemen group decided to call the operating company of the facilities 'KEIHANNA,' which has a soft sound and represents Kyoto, Nara, and Osaka).
sen.cmt: 文化学術研究交流施設→a Cultural and Research Interaction Facility としました。"In April 1989, the"→"April 1989: The"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1989年（平成元年）6月 株式会社けいはんな設立発起人会開催。
sen.e: In June 1989, the meeting of the founders of KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. took place.
In June 1989, the meeting of the founders of KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. took place.
June 1989: The meeting of the founders of Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporated took place.
sen.cmt: 株式会社けいはんな→Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporated としました。"In June 1989, the"→"June 1989: The"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1989年（平成元年）8月2日 株式会社けいはんな設立 (会長 宇野 收、社長 小林 庄一郎 資本金：27億円 本店設置場所：京都市下京区五条通烏丸東入松屋町438）。
sen.e: In August 2, 1989, KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. was launched (Chairman Osamu UNO; President Shoichiro KOBAYASHI: capital fund of \2.7 billion; head office at 438 Matsuya-cho, Gojyo-dori Karasuma Higashi Iru, Shimogyo-ku, Kyoto City).

On August 2, 1989, KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. was launched (Chairman Osamu UNO; President Shoichiro KOBAYASHI: capital fund of \2.7 billion; head office at 438 Matsuya-cho, Gojyo-dori Karasuma Higashi Iru, Shimogyo-ku, Kyoto City).

August 2, 1989: Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporated was launched (Chairman Osamu UNO; President Shoichiro KOBAYASHI: capital fund of 2.7 billion yen; head office at 438 Matsuya-cho, Gojo-dori Karasuma Higashi Iru, Shimogyo Ward, Kyoto City).
sen.cmt: 株式会社けいはんな→Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporated としました。Shimogyo Ward としました。"On August 2, 1989,"→"August 2, 1989:"に変更しました。

sen.j: 「株式会社けいはんな」を「文化学術研究交流施設を整備する株式会社」として内閣総理大臣が指定。
sen.e: The Prime Minister has appointed KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. as "a company that builds Research Intersection Facilities."
The Prime Minister has appointed KEIHANNA Co. Ltd. as "a company that builds Mixed Academic Research Facilities."
sen.cmt: 「Research Intersection」→「Mixed Academic Research」, I think it is necessary to specify which prime minister.
sen.e: The Prime Minister has appointed Keihanna Interaction Plaza Incorporated as 'a company that manages a cultural and research interaction facility.'
sen.cmt: 文化学術研究交流施設→a Cultural and Research Interaction Facility としました。

sen.j: 1993年（平成5年）4月 けいはんなプラザ竣工（本店をけいはんなプラザ内に移転）。
sen.e: In April 1993, KEIHANNA PLAZA was completed (the head office moved to KEIHANNA PLAZA).
In April 1993, KEIHANNA PLAZA was completed (the head office moved to KEIHANNA PLAZA).
April 1993: KEIHANNA PLAZA was completed (the head office moved to KEIHANNA PLAZA).

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）12月 民事再生手続き開始の申し立て
sen.e: In December 2007, it filed for bankruptcy protection.
In December 2007, it filed for bankruptcy protection.
December 2007: it filed for bankruptcy protection.

sen.j: 特徴
sen.e: Features
Features
Features

sen.j: 当初関西文化学術研究都市はオーソドックスな形の学術研究都市がめざされた。
sen.e: Kansai Science City initially aimed at a classic academic research town.
The original goal of Kansai Science City was to create a classic academic research town.
The original goal of Kansai Science City was to create a classic academic research town.

sen.j: しかし昨今のアメリカにおける経済発展が、シリコンバレーに代表されるICTを中心としたイノベーションであることがはっきりし、日本も同様のモデルによる経済発展が求められている中、研究開発機能と新産業創出機能を集積した施設が各地で建設されるようになった。
sen.e: However, inspired by the fact that the driving force for the recent economic development in the US was the innovation of technologies as typified by the information and communication technology (ICT) in Silicon Valley, calls for similar economic development in Japan have grown, so new facilities combining the functions of R&D and creation of new industries are being built throughout the country.

However, inspired by the fact that the driving force for recent economic development in the US was technological innovation as typified by the information and communication technology (ICT) in Silicon Valley, calls for similar economic development in Japan have grown, so new facilities combining the functions of R&D and the creation of new industries are being built throughout the country.

However, inspired by the fact that the driving force for recent economic development in the US was technological innovation as typified by the information and communication technology (ICT) in Silicon Valley, calls for similar economic development in Japan have grown, so new facilities combining the functions of R&D and the creation of new industries are being built throughout the country.

sen.j: ここは、その阪神工業地帯における代表的施設であるとともに、関西文化学術研究都市の中心となっている施設である。
sen.e: This is a leading facility for the purposes in Hanshin Industrial Area, and also the center for Kansai Science City.
This is a leading facility in the Hanshin Industrial Area, and also at the center of Kansai Science City.
This is a leading facility in the Hanshin Industrial Area, and also at the center of Kansai Science City.

sen.j: 類似の施設として京浜工業地帯においては、横浜市金沢区に財団法人横浜産業振興公社と住友生命相互保険会社が運営する横浜金沢ハイテクセンター等がある。
sen.e: A Similar facility in Keihin Industrial Area is Yokohama Kanazawa High-Tec Center Kanazawa-ku, Yokohama City, jointly operated by Yokohama Industrial Development Corporation and Sumitomo Life Insurance Company.

A Similar facility in Keihin Industrial Area is Yokohama Kanazawa High-Tec Center Kanazawa-ku, Yokohama City, jointly operated by Yokohama Industrial Development Corporation and Sumitomo Life Insurance Company.

A similar facility in Keihin Industrial Area is Yokohama Kanazawa High-Tec Center in Kanazawa Ward, Yokohama City, jointly operated by Yokohama Industrial Development Corporation and Sumitomo Life Insurance Company.

sen.j: けいはんな近辺の主な大学、大学院大学
sen.e: Universities and graduate schools in the neighborhood of KEIHANNA PLAZA
Universities and graduate schools in the neighborhood of KEIHANNA PLAZA
Universities and graduate schools in the neighborhood of KEIHANNA PLAZA

sen.j: 同志社大学(京田辺キャンパス、学研都市キャンパス)
sen.e: Doshisha University (Kyotanabe Campus, Gakken Toshi Campus)
Doshisha University (Kyotanabe Campus, Gakken Toshi Campus)
Doshisha University (Kyotanabe Campus, Gakkentoshi Campus)

sen.j: 大阪電気通信大学
sen.e: Osaka Electric Communication University
Osaka Electric Communication University
Osaka Electric Communication University

sen.j: 大阪産業大学
sen.e: Osaka Sangyo University
Osaka Sangyo University
Osaka Sangyo University

sen.j: 奈良先端科学技術大学院大学
sen.e: Nara Institute of Science & Technology
Nara Institute of Science & Technology
Nara Institute of Science & Technology

sen.j: 奈良大学
sen.e: Nara University
Nara University
Nara University

sen.j: 道路
sen.e: By car
By car
By car

sen.j: 京奈和自動車道精華学研インターチェンジ下車。
sen.e: Closest ext of the expressway is Keinawa Expressway Seika Gakken Interchange.
sen.cmt: 京奈和自動車道精華学研インターチェンジ→Keinawa Expressway Seika Gakken Interchange[定訳不明]
sen.e: The closest exit of the expressway is Keinawa Expressway Seika Gakken Interchange.
The closest exit of the expressway is Keinawa Expressway Seika Gakken Interchange.

sen.j: 鉄道
sen.e: By train
By train
By train

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道片町線祝園駅下車。
sen.e: Get off at Gion Station of Katamachi Line of West Japan Railway.
Get off at Gion Station on the Katamachi Line run by West Japan Railway.
sen.cmt: It may be better to remove the name of the company as this seems a little unnatural. 「of」→「on the」, 「of」→「run by」
sen.e: Get off at Hosono Station on the Katamachi Line run by West Japan Railway.

sen.j: 近鉄京都線新祝園駅下車。
sen.e: Get off at Shin-gion Station of Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
Get off at Shin-gion Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
Get off at Shin-Hosono Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.

sen.j: 両駅から奈良交通バスまたは精華くるりんバス10分「ATR」バス停下車すぐ。
sen.e: From either station above, take Nara Kotsu Bus or Seika Kururin Bus, and in ten minutes get off at "ATR" Bus Stop. It is very close to the bus stop.
From either of these stations, take the Nara Kotsu Bus or the Seika Kururin Bus, and after ten minutes get off at "ATR" Bus Stop, which is very close.
sen.cmt: 「station above」→「of these stations」, 「the」挿入x2, 「in」→「after」, 「It is very close to the bus stop.」→「, which is very close.」一文に戻しました。
sen.e: From either of these stations, take the Nara Kotsu Bus or the Seika Kururin Bus, and after ten minutes get off at 'ATR' Bus Stop, which is very close.
